lead_paragraph: Former Secretary of State Hillary Rodham Clinton said Thursday the U.S. should become what she called the world's 21st-century clean energy superpower, during remarks resembling both a campaign speech and a call to action at the annual National Clean Energy Summit in Las Vegas.

headline.main: Hillary Clinton: US Should Lead on Clean Energy
headline.print_headline: Hillary Clinton: US Should Lead on Clean Energy
